form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: PNC Diarrhoea> Diarrhoea with No Dehydration Two

field.name: Give Extra Fluids (as much as the child will take)
Breastfeed frequently and for longer at each feed
If baby is exclusively breastfed, give ORS or clean water in addition to breast milk
If baby is NOT exclusively breastfed, give one or more of the following:
Safe food-based fluids: such as soup without pepper, strained rice water, mashed kenkey with clean water, coconut water, koko (porridge)
It is especially important to give ORS at home when:
The baby has been treated with some or severe dehydration during this visit
The baby cannot return to a health facility if the diarrhoea gets worse
